# Configuration for module: inputdriverDIRECTINPUT8



if (WIN32)
  set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES 
    include/DLLMainInputDriverDI8.h
  )

  set( PLATFORM_HEADER_INSTALL "WIN32" )
  source_group( "Platform Header Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    src/DLLMainInputDriverDI8.cpp
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "WIN32" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

elseif (WIN64)
  set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES 
    include/DLLMainInputDriverDI8.h
  )

  set( PLATFORM_HEADER_INSTALL "WIN64" )
  source_group( "Platform Header Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    src/DLLMainInputDriverDI8.cpp
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "WIN64" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

endif ()

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

# Per CMake limitation, we must set any additional library search paths before defining the target
if ( WIN32 )
  link_directories( $ENV{DXSDK_DIR}/Lib/x86 )
endif( WIN32 )
if ( WIN64 )
  link_directories( $ENV{DXSDK_DIR}/Lib/x86 )
endif( WIN64 )


if( WIN32 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "inputdriverDIRECTINPUT8" )
elseif( WIN64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "inputdriverDIRECTINPUT8" )
endif()
if( WIN32 )
  add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN64 )
  add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
endif()

if ( WIN32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefINPUT gucefMT )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} dinput8 dxguid )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "BUILD_GUCEF_INPUT_PLUGIN_DLL;INPUTDRIVERDIRECTINPUT8_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefINPUT gucefMT )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} dinput8 dxguid )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "BUILD_GUCEF_INPUT_PLUGIN_DLL;INPUTDRIVERDIRECTINPUT8_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN64 )

include_directories( ../../../common/include ../../../platform/gucefCORE/include ../../../platform/gucefINPUT/include ../../../platform/gucefMT/include )

if ( WIN32 )
  include_directories( $ENV{DXSDK_DIR}/Include ../../../dependencies/external ../../../platform/gucefCORE/include/mswin include )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  include_directories( ../../../platform/gucefCORE/include/mswin include )
endif( WIN64 )

elseif (WIN64)
